data.text: Yeah, that's the last one. It's the big one. It's the one of the future and that's MOOCs. So MOOCs stands for Massive Open Online Course and that (module) shows you how to make a full course based on video, so first you can make videos using Screencast-O-Matic or Screenflow or Camtasia, and then once you have the videos you can create your own lessons online using Teachable or Udemy. You can basically create your own school online and just upload your videos. Or you can put them on Vimeo or Youtube and create playlists.
